name: One-wheel Drive
description:
TURN DOWN YOUR VOLUME!!!

Your car is wrecked and has one wheel left, but you absolutely must deliver Bliny and Borscht to your babushka. This game was made in ~2 days for the 165th weekly game jam, and its the 2nd game I've ever finished and released. This is not an infinite-runner, it is in fact very smol indeed. 

Controls:

Space :O
